<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Create and train IAR workflow solution. This applies to SD -> Tokyo/Utah upgrades.</description>
        <name>Create IAR workflow solution</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateCapability();
createWfSolution();

function updateCapability() {
    var languageConfigGr = new GlideRecord(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIG_LANGUAGE_TABLE_NAME);
    languageConfigGr.addNotNullQuery('ml_solution_name');
    languageConfigGr.query();
    while (languageConfigGr.next()) {
        if (languageConfigGr.isValidField("capability")) {
            var capability = AutoResolutionUtil.getCapabilityFromSolutionDefintion(languageConfigGr.getValue('ml_solution_name'));
            var solutionCapability = AutoResolutionUtil.getSolutionCapabilityToPersistInDB(capability);
            if (!gs.nil(solutionCapability)) {
                languageConfigGr.setValue('capability', solutionCapability);
                languageConfigGr.update();
                gs.info("Executing IAR fix script: Updated capbility={0} on language config record with solution name={1}", capability, languageConfigGr.getValue('ml_solution_name'));
            }
        }
    }
}

function createWfSolution() {
    var configGr = new GlideRecord(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIG_TABLE_NAME);
    configGr.addQuery(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIGURATION_TABLENAME_FIELD_NAME, AutoResolutionConstants.INCIDENT_TABLE_NAME);
    configGr.query();

    while (configGr.next()) {
        //Query Workflow solution
        var workflowGr = new GlideRecord(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIG_LANGUAGE_TABLE_NAME);
        workflowGr.addQuery(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIGURATION_FIELD_NAME, configGr.getUniqueValue());
        workflowGr.addQuery('capability', AutoResolutionConstants.ML_CAPBILITIES.AGENT_ZERO_WORKFLOW);
        workflowGr.query();

		//Query active Agent Zero solution
		var agentZeroGr = new GlideRecord(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIG_LANGUAGE_TABLE_NAME);
		agentZeroGr.addQuery(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIGURATION_FIELD_NAME, configGr.getUniqueValue());
		agentZeroGr.addQuery('capability', AutoResolutionConstants.ML_CAPBILITIES.AGENT_ZERO);
		agentZeroGr.addActiveQuery();
		agentZeroGr.query();

		//Query business rule that only allows one active language config per IAR config
		var activeCheckBr = new GlideRecord('sys_script');

        //No Workflow solution so create and train it (SD -> Tokyo/Utah upgrade)
        if (!workflowGr.next()) {

			//Need to deactivate BR for SD->Utah case
			if (agentZeroGr.next() && activeCheckBr.get(AutoResolutionConstants.LANGUAGE_CONFIG_ACTIVE_CHECK_BR)) {
				gs.info("Executing IAR fix script: Setting 'Only 1 active langauge config per lang BR' to false");
				activeCheckBr.active = false;
				activeCheckBr.update();
			}
			
            //Train Workflow solution, SD -> Tokyo/Utah upgrade will create new solution
            var script = "var mlHelper = new AutoResolutionMLHelper(\"" + configGr.getUniqueValue() + "\"); " +
                "var result = mlHelper.createSolutionAndTrain(); " +
                "if (result.status === 'error') " +
                "gs.warn(\"Executing IAR fix script: error occurred during creating workflow solution {0}\", result.msg); " +
                "else " +
                "gs.info(\"Executing IAR fix script: Successfully created workflow solution and made the legacy auto-resolution solution inactive.\");";

            var solutionSysTrigger = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger");
            solutionSysTrigger.initialize();
            solutionSysTrigger.setValue("name", 'Create and train IAR wf solution');
            solutionSysTrigger.setValue("script", script);
            solutionSysTrigger.setValue("trigger_type", 0);
            solutionSysTrigger.insert();
        }
	}
}]]></script>
